dynamic_line.yes: What are you doing here, woman, why are you speaking to me.
dynamic_line.no: Why are you speaking to me.

responses.text: What exactly do you do here?

dynamic_line: I am a proud soldier of the empire, The treacherous Atlantic Federation has decided to make war with us. It shall be their undoing.

dynamic_line.yes: What are you doing here, woman, why are you speaking to me. I don't think somebody like you would be able to understand imperial science.
dynamic_line.no: Why are you speaking to me.

responses.text: What exactly do you do here?

dynamic_line: Without scientists like me, the Empire would lose the industrial edge it has had since the start of the Europan industrial revolution. Our genius and intellectual prowess is what keeps this empire turning, despite what the brutes in the infantry sections might tell you.

dynamic_line.yes: What are you doing here, woman, why are you speaking to me. I don't think somebody like you would be able to understand what it takes to be an officer in His Majesty's army!.
dynamic_line.no: Why are you speaking to me.

responses.text: What exactly do you do here? What does being an Imperial Officer entail?

dynamic_line: Lead my men, organize my divisions and conduct operations in the war against Gallia. It's not easy by any means, and I often envy my subordinates, they don't have to worry about the fate of an entire company, regiment or division at all times.
